description.value:
Prerequisite: The mech must have a cargo hold auxiliary system.

The mech’s cargo hold conceals subtle boosters that can launch its contents at high velocity.

Dispatch Hot (3 PP) As a standard action, the mech can transfer one operator into a vehicle it has stored in its cargo hold, after which the mech launches the stored vehicle at high speed; the vehicle exits the mech using the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.dXoXgaKcx2ZfBD4M.JournalEntryPage.zCcCCt0bQOyXxODx#race]{race} action (Core Rulebook 278). The pilot of the launched vehicle, if any, doesn’t need to succeed at a Piloting check as part of the race action this turn.
